attributes.action: A mandatory registration and theft insurance for leisure vehicle storage units
attributes.additional_details: There is not any legislation to cover storage facilities for motorhomes and caravans which in todays climate is unacceptable
attributes.background: Introduce a compulsory insurance to cover theft and damage while stored and a registration for all leisure vehicle storage facilities

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about services for storage of leisure vehicles are a matter for individual customers and service providers, not the Government or House of Commons.
